body.p: Sámi letters are marked with an orange background. The keys with Sámi letters have their original letter available via AltGr: press AltGr + the sámi letter to get the letter that has been replaced with a Sámi one.
Example: to type a Finnish Ö, press AltGr + Õ.
Some non-Sámi letters have also been moved to get a more logical layout. These are marked with a blue background colour.
All other letters and symbols are placed as on the Finnish keyboard.
